text: Ryutosan Shrine was Shinto Shrine in Busan during the Japanese occupation of Korea. The shrine was destroyed after Japan's defeat in World War II in 1945. The ruins are now part of Yongdusan Park. Category:Kokuhei Shōsha Category:Shinto shrines in the Japanese colonial empire Category:Shinmei shrines Category:Kotohira shrines
title: Ryūtōzan Shrine
